pull.title: mlock() all private keys in memory
pull.body: Inline comment about VirtualLock() and general idea come from Matt Corallo's [encprivkeys branch](/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/232). By adding it to the custom allocator like this though, it's done for us on all CPrivKey objects automagically.

events.message:
mlock() all private keys in memory

Inline comment and idea come from the encprivkeys branch
by Matt Corallo <matt@bluematt.me>.

events.body: I like this, but an munlock() call should be issued when deallocating, after clearing the memory.
Good idea;  add a munlock and rebase and looks to me like it's ready to pull.

Been doing similar stuff for new wallet crypter, with more stuff mlocked, but looks good to me (once munlock()d)
edit: oh, I need to read, anyway, looks good to me.
Because I depend on this for the new encryption branch, I went ahead and did the munlock stuff, current version is at ee286b3ced9c80c12c369ccceb21ec287f24306b
